nodes.text: Himher was a dealer droid that worked in the Black Hole cantina in Farpoint on the planet Fhost in the year 41.5 ABY. It was the dealer in a sabacc game in which Khedryn Faal, Earsh, Flaygin and Reegas Vance were all players. Himher was named for its voice which, by some manufacturing defect, changed from that of a male to that of a female mid sentence.
Himher appeared in Paul S. Kemp's first Star Wars novel, Crosscurrent, which was published on January 26, 2010.
